name: French Bread Tomato Soup
ingredients: 1 loaf stale French bread, cut into cubes
instructions: Heat 4 Tbsp. olive oil in large pot. Add pepper and bread and fry until lightly browned (more oil may be necessary). Remove bread to paper towels. Heat 2 more Tbsp. oil and cook garlic and onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, basil and bread; cook about 10 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20-30 minutes.
